text: Malia Cohen is an American politician who served as the California State Controller. She is a member of the Democratic Party. Cohen's tenure as State Controller was marked by her focus on fiscal responsibility and accountability in managing California's finances. She worked to ensure transparency in government spending and prioritized efficiency in financial operations. Throughout her career, Cohen has been an advocate for social and economic equity, promoting policies that address income inequality and provide opportunities for all Californians. Her leadership and commitment to public service have made her a respected figure within the Democratic Party. title: Malia Cohen
